description:
Still don’t think there is an agenda with Covid19 and Bill Gates testing kits and Vaccines? His agenda to track us all? His Id2020! 
Bill Gates speaking about - a vaccine to alter the minds of people he deems as “religious fanatics” 
But Wait.... vaccines are safe. They are what we need, they don’t cause autism or kill. Are you kidding me! How long are people going to keep allowing doctors and “experts” to kill them!?
Vaccines are used to control us. People need to wake up. Come September you all will be faced with mandatory Covid19 vaccines in New York, Chicago, Virginia and California-
Bill Gates dream........to get us all. 
These vaccines are the Mark of the Beast. 
If the states listed below cave in and do what is “required” we are done.
We are at WAR.....
#religion #markofthebeast #vaccines #antivax #covid_19 #informedconsent #saynotobillgates #facts #holistichealth #jesus
